lyrics:
Ladies and gentlemen
This here is another one for the steppas
DJ Wayne Williams
Put the record on

whoa oh whoa oh whoa oh whoa yeah
whoa yeah
whoa oh whoa oh whoa oh whoa yeah
whoa,whoa

Tell me what do we do
When the DJ's playin our favorite groove
We step
[...]
